thread.section_title: Ashburn Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Ashburn Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Charlieblinkert85
title: Great location
text:
Rooms decent size for London, nice and very clean hotel.Near tube in nice area great for natural history museum.
Breakfast is continental buffet, small dining room and very cramped but adequate breakfast. Room was very hot and took couple of days to cool down. By third night was just right- guess previous occupant like to crank up the heat as it was a balmy 30* in there! We were on the front near a busy road, so at night was noisy with the window open (which we had to do to try to cool the room)
Room Tip: Ask for one away from the road See more room tips
